title: GCP-10
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[=]]
[[div style="background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png") center no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ ##red|WARNING: THE FOLLOWING FILE IS LEVEL 5/7805 CLASSIFIED##
----
+++ ANY ATTEMPT TO ACCESS THIS FILE WITHOUT LEVEL 5/7805 AUTHORIZATION WILL BE LOGGED AND WILL LEAD TO IMMEDIATE DISCIPLINARY ACTION.
[[/div]]
[[collapsible show="Input credentials" hide="Level 5/7805 Credentials Accepted"]]
[[div style="background: rgb(213, 255, 171) url("http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fragment:scp-7805-1/gcpf.png") center no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
++ ##black|This document has been created by the Great Convergence Prevention (GCP) Force in order to inform all agencies specialising in anomalous research within Dimension-Cluster-6193 about any dangers regarding the interdimensional bus stop known as GCP-10 which may directly cause or contribute to a Great Convergence event. Access to this document must be heavily restricted to minimise knowledge of the GCP Force and as such it has automatically been set to the maximum security level prescribed by the relevant organisation.##
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[div]]
[[div style="background: grey; float: left; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ ##white|Item #: 10##
[[/div]]
[[div style="background: grey; float: left; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ ##white|Alert Level: 6##
[[/div]]
[[div style="background: grey; float: left; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ ##white|Threat Level: 6##
[[/div]]
[[div style="background: white; float: left; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ ##black|Clearance Level: 4##
[[/div]]
[[<]]
[[div style="background: white; float: left; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ ##black|Name: The Amazing Cross-Dimensional Bus Service™ (TACDBS™)##
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
-----
[[<]]
[[size 110%]]GCP-10 is a bus service with the ability to transport passengers from one reality to another. It is only known to be able to travel to realities within Dimension-Cluster-6193. While its travelling between dimensions alone does not cause any threat of a GC, it has been found to break boundaries between realities when passengers are in possession of any significant technology. As a result, boarding GCP-10 instances may only be done when it has been confirmed that one has no technology above level 2 on their person.[[/size]]
-----
[[div style="background: url("http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fragment:scp-7805-1/gcpf.png") center no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
**[[size 125%]] The GCP Force has determined that the anomaly known as GCP-10 should no longer be used by any personnel wearing any technology above level 2. Failure to adhere to this regulation will result in termination within 3 days of the offense. Due to the interaction between technology and GCP-10, no organisations tasked with researching this anomaly will be able to further their research in a substantial way. To mitigate the unfortunate effect this may have on containing any potential threat GCP-10 poses on any given reality, we have archived as many research documents on GCP-10 we can and have embedded this list into all research agencies' documentations on the anomaly.[[/size]]**
[[size 110%]]{{NOTE: To avoid risking a GC or adjacent through data transference between realities, we have limited the available documents per reality to contain ones from realities within Dimension-Cluster-6193 (the only cluster currently documented to contain GCP-10), yet do not have a shared point in space with the host reality.}}[[/size]]
[[/div]]

author: FacelessPolarBear
